original_text: The army of Judah also captured ten thousand men alive, took them to the top of a cliff and threw them down so that all were dashed to pieces.
korean_text: 유다 자손이 또 만 명을 사로잡아 가지고 바위 꼭대기에 올라가서 거기서 밀쳐 내려뜨려서 그들의 온 몸이 부서지게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: The army of Judah also captured ten thousand men alive
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 군대 또한 만 명의 남자들을 생포했습니다

sentences.original_text: took them to the top of a cliff
so that all were dashed to pieces
